issue.title: 10play.com.au
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://10play.com.au/live](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2F10play.com.au%2Flive) ### Comment Username: @Cropmy5 > Having AdGuard annoyances filter ON prevents 10play from recognising that I'm already logged in. It therefore asks me to click sign in every time I navigate to the live channel stream. Turning OFF the filter fixes this issue. ### Screenshots
